accessibilityAnalysis.title: Accessibility Analysis
accessibilityAnalysis.description: Displays an area on the map that can be reached from a selected point, along a route or from a facility within a specified distance. The distance can be specified in time or in meters. The accessibility is calculated depending on the means of transport.
accessibilityAnalysis.dropdownInfo: Please choose the mode you want to work with:
accessibilityAnalysis.pointOfReference: Point of reference: click on the map
accessibilityAnalysis.setByFeature: Select facilities as location (use perimeter of polygons)
accessibilityAnalysis.setByFeatureInfo: Uses the vertices of polygons for the calculation. Caution: Can lead to errors with extremely complex surfaces.
accessibilityAnalysis.inputReminder: Please fill out all input fields.
accessibilityAnalysis.showError: The request could not be executed correctly. Please verify all inputs.
accessibilityAnalysis.askUpdate: Do you want to update the current accessibility analysis?
accessibilityAnalysis.showErrorInvalidInput: The request could not be executed correctly: One parameter has wrong format or is invalid.

travelTimeIndex.title: Travel Time Index
travelTimeIndex.tooltip: Travel Time Index compared to free roads, according to INRIX, 2021, FRC234
travelTimeIndex.help:
Travel Time Index

The travel time index describes the change in travel times at different times of the day compared to a normalized free flow of traffic (i.e. a travel time index of 1.3 corresponds to an increase in travel times or a reduction in the distance traveled by 30%). The data were collected by the company INRIX and refer to the year 2021, aggregated for the entire urban area for road classes 2, 3 and 4 (federal roads, primary roads, secondary roads). The travel time index refers exclusively to motorized traffic.
travelTimeIndex.warning: CAUTION: The accessibility was determined taking into account the travel time index for the selected time of day. The result does not claim to be accurate and does not represent a legally binding value.

accessibilityAnalysis.paginationRemoveAll: Remove all results in this tool
